name: Alec Bradley - Royal Oak Connecticut - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley Royal Oak Connecticut is handmade in Nicaragua and features a light-brown Honduran Connecticut wrapper that expertly surrounds a Nicaraguan binder and filler. The Royal Oak Connecticut creates a smooth and creamy smoking experience that will serve as the perfect companion to your favorite wine. Hand crafted by Alec Bradley, the Royal Oak Connecticut was created exclusively for Total Wine & More, which is considered one the largest independent retailers of fine wine in the country.
